thread.title: BREAKING: Kim Jong-un's half brother 'assassinated' in Malaysia
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Kim Jong-un's half brother 'assassinated' in Malaysia

title: BREAKING: Kim Jong-un's half brother 'assassinated' in Malaysia
text:
BREAKING: Kim Jong-un's half brother 'assassinated' in Malaysia BREAKING: Kim Jong-un's half brother 'assassinated' in Malaysia The half brother of North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un has reportedly been killed in Malaysia. PUBLISHED: 11:39,  47, Tue, Feb 14, 2017 
Kim Jong-nam, 45, was the oldest son of Kim Hong-ill, Kim's fathher and predeccesor. 
Intial reports by South Korean media say he was poisoned at Kuala Lumpar airport by two women said to be North Korean operatives. 
More to follow.
